titles.title: To establish a congressional commemorative medal for veterans of the Battle of Midway.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to design and strike a bronze medal in commemoration of individuals who were killed or wounded in combat operations at the Battle of Midway during World War II. Provides for: (1) certification by the Secretary of Defense of individuals eligible for receipt of such medal; and (2) presentation to the appropriate individuals or their next of kin. Authorizes appropriations.
